mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Frum, Samuel B.
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Mongalia Co., VA [Monongalia County, West Virginia]
Pleasant Valley, VA [Pleasant Valley, West Virginia]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Frum, Samuel B. Patient Age: 20. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot wound (flesh) left shoulder deltoid muscle 1/4 in or less outside acromion process from before backward in battle. Location Wounded: Winchester, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/07/20. Nature of Wound: Musket ball. Treatment: Simple dref[s]sings. Result: Transferred to Washington City by order of Board of Inspections for Hospitals.
